title: Login Issue - Cannot access account
description: Customer is unable to login to their account. They have tried resetting their password, but the email link expires immediately.

title: Payment Failure on Checkout
description: User is getting a 404 error when clicking the 'Complete Purchase' button on the mobile app.

title: Update Billing Address
description: Request to change the corporate billing address for the upcoming Q1 invoice.

title: Slow Dashboard Loading
description: The analytics dashboard is taking more than 10 seconds to render for users with large datasets.

title: API Documentation Typo
description: The endpoint for /v1/users/auth is documented incorrectly in the developer portal.

title: Broken Image Links in Blog
description: Several images in the latest blog post are appearing as broken icons on Safari browsers.

title: Feature Request: Dark Mode
description: A high-priority enterprise client is requesting a native dark mode for the desktop application.

title: Subscription Cancellation
description: Customer wants to cancel their premium subscription before the next billing cycle on the 20th.

title: Data Export Failure
description: Attempting to export a CSV of the last 30 days results in a server timeout error.

title: Mobile App Crashing on iOS 17
description: Users reporting immediate crashes upon opening the app after the latest OS update.

title: Password Reset Email Delay
description: Emails are taking up to 30 minutes to arrive in the inbox for Gmail users.

title: Refund Status Inquiry
description: Customer is checking on the status of a refund initiated on Jan 10th.
